name: Sailor Mariner's Crazy Sexy
description:
This is a fan-fiction game of "the IDOLM@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS" in the "Crazy Taxi" style.

----

Seira Mizuki (the runner) and Sarina Matsumoto (on the cart) form the idol unit "Sailor Mariner" in the game "the IDOL M@STER CINDERELLA GIRLS Starlight Stage". Deliver a lot of SEXY haerts to the Producers (P-Heads) with them!

----

Explore the small town, Find the P-Heads and deliver SEXY Hearts to them. 

More bonuses and time extension by attacking closer, but failing on contact.

WASD or Arrow keys to move, and z/shift/space keys to Attack, Esc/Q/P to Pause. Or you may play with GamePad.
